mapper.select: select i.no, i.title, i.content, i.id, m.name, i.writeDate, i.fileName from image i, member m where (no=#{no}) and (m.id= i.id)
mapper.insert: insert into image(no, title, content, id, fileName) values(image_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: update image set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where no = #{no}
